name: SQL script Products in Each Catagory

content.query:
SELECT
    Category, COUNT(*) AS ProductCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake8xze761.dfs.core.windows.net/files/products.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY Category;
